Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.security_pcr_check.security_pcr_check

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

import os
import shutil

from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval_exceptions import TestError
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval import AutovalUtils
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.attest_test import Attest_test
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.site_utils import SiteUtils

ELF_LOCATON = "/boot/efi/"
EFIBOOTMGR = "/usr/local/bin/efibootmgr-remount -n 0001"
FILEPATH = "/mnt/vol/havoc/autoval/bin/tpm/"


[docs]class SecurityPCRCheck(TestBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self):
        super(SecurityPCRCheck, self).__init__()
        self.cycle_count = self.test_control.get('cycle_count', 10)
        self.check_drtm = self.test_control.get('check_drtm', False)
        self.check_srtm = self.test_control.get('check_srtm', False)
        self.attest_on = self.test_control.get('attest_on', False)
        self.tpmupgradeinfo_path = self.test_control.get('filepath', FILEPATH)
        self.tpmupgradeinfo_file = self.test_control.get('file', None)
        self.bios_settings = self.test_control.get('bios_settings', None)
        self.original_bios_path = os.path.join(
            self.resultsdir, "original_bios_dump.txt")



[docs]    def execute(self):
        self.log_info("This is the PCR Check Test")

        version = self.host.inband.get_tpm_version(self.host)
        self.log_info("TPM version: %s" % version)

        if self.bios_settings:
            self.log_info("Taking original BIOS dump backup")
            self.original_bios_path = self.host.bios.get_bios_settings_dump(
                self.original_bios_path)
            self.log_info("Updating BIOS with changes")
            # This will update bios_settings if any settings modified
            temp_bios_dump = os.path.join(self.resultsdir, "temp_bios_dump.txt")
            self.bios_changes = self.host.bios.update_bios_settings(
                self.bios_settings, temp_bios_dump)

        # Get available options
        SHA = self.host.inband.get_tpm_sha(self.host)
        for sha in SHA:
            if version >= "2.0":
                self.log_info("Get PCRs for TPM Algorithm: %s" % sha)
            else:
                self.log_info("Get PCRs")

            # Get local and vendor PCRs
            self.log_info("Pre-check of PCRs values:")
            PCRs = self.host.inband.get_pcrs(self.host, sha)
            # TODO:
            #vendor_PCRs = self.host.inband.get_vendor_pcrs(self.host, sha)
            vendor_PCRs = self.host.inband.get_pcrs(self.host, sha)

            # Verify PCR0 by default
            result = self._check_PCR0(PCRs)
            self.validate_condition(result, "Sanity check of PCR0 values")
            result = self._check_PCR0(PCRs, vendor_PCRs)
            self.validate_condition(result, "PCR[0] value matched with vendor")

            if self.check_srtm:
                result = self._check_PCR_SRTM(PCRs)
                self.validate_condition(result, "Sanity check of SRTM values")
                result = self._check_PCR_SRTM(PCRs, False, vendor_PCRs)
                self.validate_condition(result, "SRTM values matched with vendor")

            if self.check_drtm:
                result = self._check_PCR_DRTM(PCRs)
                if (result is False) and self.tpmupgradeinfo_file:
                    self.log_info("PCR[1-7] are zeros, Updating TPM...")
                    self._update_tpm(self.host)
                    PCRs = self.host.inband.get_pcrs(self.host, sha)
                    result = self._check_PCR_DRTM(PCRs)
                self.validate_condition(result, "Sanity check of DRTM values")
                result = self._check_PCR_DRTM(PCRs, False, vendor_PCRs)
                self.validate_condition(result, "DRTM values matched with vendor")

            if self.attest_on:
                self.log_info("Running remote attestestation")
                attest_ = Attest_test(self.hostname)
                attest_.run_attest_cli(self.host)
                self.log_info("Running local attestestation")
                self._run_local_attest(self.host)

            self.log_info("%d Reboot Cycles for PCR Consistency:" % (self.cycle_count))
            for n in range(1, (self.cycle_count + 1)):
                self.log_info("Reset for PCR Consistency: Iteration %d" % n)
                self.pcr_consistency(self.host, PCRs, sha, "reset")
                self.log_info("On-Off for PCR Consistency: Iteration %d" % n)
                self.pcr_consistency(self.host, PCRs, sha, "power_off_on")
                self.log_info("DC Reboot for PCR Consistency: Iteration %d" % n)
                self.pcr_consistency(self.host, PCRs, sha, "dc")
                self.log_info("Warm Reboot for PCR Consistency: Iteration %d" % n)
                self.pcr_consistency(self.host, PCRs, sha, "warm")



[docs]    def pcr_consistency(self, host, PCRs, sha, cycle_type):
        self.host.cycle_host(self.host, cycle_type)
        PCRs_new = self.host.inband.get_pcrs(self.host, sha)

        # Verify PCR0 by default
        result = self._check_PCR0(PCRs, PCRs_new)
        self.validate_condition(result, "Consistency check of PCR0 values")

        if self.check_srtm:
            result = self._check_PCR_SRTM(PCRs, True, PCRs_new)
            self.validate_condition(result, "Consistency check of SRTM values")

        if self.check_drtm:
            result = self._check_PCR_DRTM(PCRs, True, PCRs_new)
            self.validate_condition(result, "Consistency check of DRTM values")

        if self.attest_on:
            self.log_info("Running remote attestestation")
            attest_ = Attest_test(self.hostname)
            attest_.run_attest_cli(self.host)
            self.log_info("Running local attestestation")
            self._run_local_attest(self.host)


    def _update_tpm(self, host):
        try:
            self.log_info("Updating TPM...")
            cmd = "cp -Rrf  %s/%s %s" % (
                self.tpmupgradeinfo_path, self.tpmupgradeinfo_file, ELF_LOCATON
            )
            self.host.run(cmd)
            cmd = "cp %s/startup.nsh %s" % (
                self.tpmupgradeinfo_path, ELF_LOCATON
            )
            self.host.run(cmd)
            self.host.run("cd %s; %s" % (ELF_LOCATON, EFIBOOTMGR))
            self.host.inband.reboot()
            self.host.run("rm -rf %s/%s" % (ELF_LOCATON, self.tpmupgradeinfo_file))
        except Exception as e:
            raise TestError("Failed to Update TPM, Error: %s" % str(e))

    def _check_PCR0(self, pcrs, pcrs_comp=None):
        # Check if PCR0 is non 00/FF, or compare to another PCR0
        pcrs_comp = [] if pcrs_comp is None else pcrs_comp
        if pcrs[0].count("00") or pcrs[0].count("FF"):
            self.log_info("Sanity PCR[0] failed")
            return False
        if pcrs_comp:
            self.validate_equal(pcrs_comp[0], pcrs[0], "PCR[0] comparison")
        return True

    def _check_PCR_SRTM(self, pcrs, local=True, pcrs_comp=None):
        # Check if PCR[1-7] are non 00/FF, or compare to another PCRs
        pcrs_comp = [] if pcrs_comp is None else pcrs_comp
        if local:
            #Compare PCR[1-7] accross reboots
            index = 8
        else:
            # Compare PCR[1-3] accross hosts with same BIOS\Addon cards
            index = 4
        for i in range(1, index):
            if pcrs[i].count("00") > 10 or pcrs[i].count("FF") > 10:
                self.log_info("Sanity PCR[%d] failed" % i)
                return False
        if pcrs_comp:
            for i in range(1, index):
                self.validate_equal(pcrs_comp[i], pcrs[i], "PCR[%d] comparison" % i)
        return True

    def _check_PCR_DRTM(self, pcrs, local=True, pcrs_comp=None):
        # Check if PCR values for TPM2.0 range is 17-18 and TPM1.0 is 17-19
        range_list = [17, 18]
        version = self.host.inband.get_tpm_version(self.host)
        if version < "2.0":
            range_list.append(19)
        #Compare PCR[4] accross hosts with same BIOS\OS
        if not local:
            range_list.append(4)
        pcrs_comp = [] if pcrs_comp is None else pcrs_comp
        for i in range_list:
            if pcrs[i].count("00") > 10 or pcrs[i].count("FF") > 10:
                self.log_info("Sanity PCR[%d] failed" % i)
                return False
        if pcrs_comp:
            for i in range_list:
                self.validate_equal(pcrs_comp[i], pcrs[i], "PCR[%d] comparison" % i)
        return True

    def _run_local_attest(self, host):
        # Copy over the attestation script into the file
        version = self.host.inband.get_tpm_version(self.host)
        if version < "2.0":
            attest_script = os.path.join(
                SiteUtils().get_firmware_path(), 'security/', 'Local_attest.tar.gz'
            )
            shutil.copy(attest_script, self.resultsdir)
            os.chdir(self.resultsdir)
            self.host.localhost.run(
                '/bin/tar xvf ' + self.resultsdir + '/Local_attest.tar.gz'
            )

            # Make all binary executable.
            os.chdir(self.resultsdir + '/local_attest')
            ATTEST_SCRIPT_PATH = (self.resultsdir + '/local_attest/local_attest.sh')
            if (
                os.path.isfile(ATTEST_SCRIPT_PATH)
                and os.access(ATTEST_SCRIPT_PATH, os.X_OK)
            ):
                pass
            else:
                self.host.run('chmod +x ', ATTEST_SCRIPT_PATH)

            # Now run local attestation
            self.log_info("Initialize tcsd")
            self.host.run("tcsd start", ignore_status=True)
            self.log_info("Execute local_attest.sh")
            ATTEST_SCRIPT_FOLDER_PATH = (self.resultsdir + '/local_attest')
            self.host.run(
                "./local_attest.sh", working_directory=ATTEST_SCRIPT_FOLDER_PATH
            )
            self.host.run("tcsd stop", ignore_status=True)
        else:
            AutovalUtils.log_info(
                "Local attestion not supported for TPM 2.0 or greater"
            )


[docs]    def cleanup(self):
        if self.bios_settings:
            if self.bios_changes:
                self.log_info("Reverting back the original BIOS settings")
                self.host.bios.update_bios_setting_from_dump(self.original_bios_path)
        super(SecurityPCRCheck, self).cleanup(
            cfg_filter=None, config_check=True, config_data=None)



[docs]def main():
    test = SecurityPCRCheck()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
